product_info.title: ZC10L LARGE-FORMAT CARD PRINTER
product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZC10L LARGE-FORMAT CARD PRINTER
ZC10L Large-format Card Printer
Print stunning, edge-to-edge, oversized custom cards and badges in full
color in one pass
Designed especially to meet the needs of the Hospitality market, Zebra’s ZC10Lᵀᴹ is the only large-format, direct-to-card printer that
can print full, edge-to-edge color cards in one printing process. Produce custom, oversized badges, sporting event and concert
tickets/passes, special event and festival badges/passes on the spot in full color—in one print pass. Avoid the hassle of ordering and
inventorying pre-printed cards for various levels of guest access at events. Instead, print photo-quality cards edge-to-edge at the
point of entry. Since cards are printed on demand, you can customize them for individual guest needs. This adds personalization,
reduces waste and eliminates the risk of running out of a specific type of card should attendance change. And, with 300 dpi print
quality, the ZC10L enables you to produce cards with exceptional photo-quality images, rich colors and crisp text.
Zebra will also offer synced ribbon and card kits to eliminate
waste and operator time. Supply kits sold exclusively for the
ZC10L feature 400 cards and ribbon rolls to match. Exhaust
ribbon and cards at the same time. No leftover stock or
mismatched supplies. Customers looking to customize the
backside of cards with “fine-print” content can also order
Zebra’s monochrome black ribbon. Genuine Zebra supplies
meet stringent quality standards. Our supplies deliver
consistent results with every print job and minimize wear and
tear on critical printer parts—resulting in reduced overall
maintenance costs.
Create Guest Experiences
Zebra OneCare Services Reduce Waste and Hassle
Increase printer uptime, and reduce lost productivity and Hosting major events requires intense planning and logistical
unbudgeted repair costs, by selecting a Zebra OneCareᵀᴹ coordination. Eliminate extra work. With Zebra’s ZC10L
service agreement. A cost-effective means of planning and large-format printer, you no longer have to pre-order and
budgeting your annual maintenance expenditures, your catalog partially preprinted guest badges and tickets. And,
agreement ensures that trained Zebra™ technicians will bring you’re never left with the waste of unusable leftover stock
your printer back to factory specifications. Zebra offers a after each event.
variety of plans to fit your budget and business needs.
Your guests work hard. They want value. They expect that an
Zebra Supplies Offerings event won’t simply comprise the event itself, but rather be a
Zebra’s PVC cards, specifically designed for the ZC10L, deliver larger experience. Make your events meaningful and
outstanding durability and print quality. memorable by creating personalized experiences—starting
with visually compelling, custom guest access badges and
passes.
For more information about the ZC10L Large-format Card Printer, visit www.zebra.com/ZC10L
--- Page 2 ---
Print Full, Edge-to-edge Color Cards in One Step Enjoy Custom Flexibility
As the only large-format, direct-to-card printer that can print Create beautiful edge-to-edge card designs with graphics,
full, edge-to-edge color cards in one printing process, the text, barcodes and images using Zebra’s CardStudioᵀᴹ card
ZC10L gives you freedom to customize, eliminates hassle and design software. Then, produce those cards on demand with
reduces waste. No need to bother with partially pre-printed the ZC10L. Make card design changes right up to event
cards. Customize the backside of cards with guest instructions time—no need to preorder cards. Take guest photos at the
or “fine-print” content and print it using Zebra’s monochrome point of entry to further personalize cards, and include
black ribbon. sponsor logos and advertising.
Experience Outstanding Photo Quality
Create visually compelling cards with high-quality designs. As
a modified 300 dpi photo printer, the ZC10L delivers
exceptional image quality, especially for background graphics
and photos. Create new revenue streams by including
sponsorship logos and advertising placements. With stunning
images and graphics, your badges and passes become guest
mementos long after the event instead of only as access tools
at the event.
--- Page 3 ---
Specifications
Markets and
Applications
Printing Communications Interfaces
Hospitality
• Direct to card — dye diffusion USB 2.0
• Full color or monochrome printing USB supports plug-and-play printer identification • Sporting events
• Single-sided printing 10/100 Ethernet connectivity (External Print Server Option) • Concerts
• Max print speed single-side color 195 cph*
• Conferences
• Max print speed single-sided K mono 360-410 cph*
• Festivals
• Photo-quality images
• Edge-to-edge printing Electrical
Auto-switching AC power
Standard Features 90V~264V AC and 48 - 62 Hz
• USB connectivity
• 200 card (24 mil) capacity feeder Options and Accessories
• 70 card capacity output hopper
• Multi-status LED operator display
Zebra OneCare Service program
• 300 dpi print resolution
10/1000 Ethernet connectivity External Print Server
• 64 MB memory standard
• Zebra CardStudio 2.0 card design and issuance software (30 day
trial)
• Microsoft™ Windows™ drivers Warranty

Physical Characteristics ZC10L is warranted against defects in workmanship and materials
for a period of 1 (one) year from the date of shipment. For
complete warranty statement, go to
